mapper.sql: grant_committee_member_id, grant_committee_id, user_id, org_id, lead_team_id, party_member_id, person_name, positive_id, positive_name, tenure_mode, tenure_begin, tenure_duration, tenure_leave, as_committee_member, as_committee_director, lead_member_order, ebl_flag, del_flag, order_num, description, create_time, create_userid, create_username, update_time, update_userid, update_username, version
mapper.select: SELECT B.*, U.gender, U.phone, d.unit_id, d.unit_name, d.name AS org_name, A.org_id AS current_org_id, ( SELECT name FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = A.org_id ) AS current_org_name FROM tab_pb_grant_committee A INNER JOIN tab_pb_grant_committe_member B ON A.grant_committee_id = B.grant_committee_id INNER JOIN sys_user U ON B.user_id = U.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON B.org_id = d.dept_id WHERE B.del_flag = '0' AND B.grant_committee_member_id = #{grantCommitteeMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:

version,

update tab_pb_grant_committe_member
grant_committee_id = #{grantCommitteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

positive_name = #{positiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenure_mode = #{tenureMode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tenure_begin = #{tenureBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tenure_duration = #{tenureDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tenure_leave = #{tenureLeave,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
as_committee_member = #{asCommitteeMember,jdbcType=TINYINT},
as_committee_director = #{asCommitteeDirector,jdbcType=TINYINT},
lead_member_order = #{leadMemberOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where grant_committee_member_id = #{grantCommitteeMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from tab_pb_grant_committe_member where del_flag='0' and grant_committee_id= #{grantCommitteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT B.grant_committee_member_id,B.grant_committee_id,B.user_id,B.org_id,B.lead_team_id,B.party_member_id, B.person_name,B.positive_id,B.positive_name,B.tenure_mode,B.tenure_begin,B.tenure_duration, B.tenure_leave,B.as_committee_member,B.as_committee_director,B.lead_member_order, U.gender, U.phone, d.unit_id, d.unit_name, d.NAME AS org_name, A.org_id AS current_org_id, ( SELECT NAME FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = A.org_id ) AS current_org_name FROM tab_pb_grant_committee A INNER JOIN tab_pb_grant_committe_member B ON A.grant_committee_id = B.grant_committee_id INNER JOIN sys_user U ON B.user_id = U.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON B.org_id = d.dept_id WHERE B.del_flag = '0'
and A.grant_committee_id = #{grantCommitteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and B.person_name like concat('%', #{personName}, '%')
and B.positive_name like concat('%',#{positiveName},'%')

mapper.select: SELECT B.grant_committee_member_id,B.grant_committee_id,B.user_id,B.org_id,B.lead_team_id,B.party_member_id, B.person_name,B.positive_id,B.positive_name,B.tenure_mode,B.tenure_begin,B.tenure_duration, B.tenure_leave,B.as_committee_member,B.as_committee_director,B.lead_member_order, U.gender, U.phone, d.unit_id, d.unit_name, d.name AS org_name, A.org_id AS current_org_id, ( SELECT name FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = A.org_id ) AS current_org_name FROM tab_pb_grant_committee A INNER JOIN tab_pb_grant_committe_member B ON A.grant_committee_id = B.grant_committee_id INNER JOIN sys_user U ON B.user_id = U.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON B.org_id = d.dept_id WHERE B.del_flag = '0' AND B.grant_committee_member_id = #{grantCommitteeMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
